prodNameC: "西門子" B型鈉尿縮氨酸試劑
ingredientsDesc:
Lite reagent: monoclonal mouse anti-human BNP F(ab’)2 fragment antibody (~0.025μg/mL) labeled with acridinium ester in buffer with bovine gamma globulin, mouse gamma globulin and preservatives
Solid phase: monoclonal mouse anti-human BNP antibody (~1.25μg/mL) in bovine gamma globulin, mouse gamma globulin and preservatives
Calibrator: after reconstitution, low or high levels of synthetic human BNP in lyophilized buffered sodium caseinate with sodium azide (<0.1%)
QC: various levels of synthetic human BNP in lyophilized buffered sodium caseinate with sodium azide (<0.1%)
applicantName: 西門子醫療設備股份有限公司
applicantAddr: 臺北市南港區園區街3號2樓之2
efficacy: 用於體外診斷，利用ADVIA CentaurTM系統定量人類血清中的B型鈉尿縮氨酸(BNP)。
mdFormat: 02816634: 500 tests02816138: 100 tests02817266: 2x2 mL low calibrators2x2 mL high calibrators02817045: 3x2 mL level 1 QC3x2 mL level 2 QC3x2 mL level 3QC
